column5: VERY IMPORTANT that you know before booking that this is NOT a room. This listing is for a private and quiet pad site to park your RV or camper with connections for water, sewer, & 50 or 20 amp service(see pictures). There is no access to the main house.  Less than 2 miles to Denton downtown square. Nearby shopping, restaurants, & a lovely public park. Very close to UNT, Apogee stadium, & Interstate 35.
column8: Private RV & Camper Site Near Downtown Denton
